item.title: Replacing low values to spaces in Mainframe Sort
item.description: In Mainframe, using Sort, how can I replace all the low-values in a file to spaces? We can use ALTSEQ CODE to change the low-values or high-values to spaces in a file using Sort. Here’s an example of how you could change all low values (X’00’) to spaces (X’40’), in an FB data set with an LRECL of 80: ALTSEQ CODE=(0040) OUTREC FIELDS=(1,80,TRAN=ALTSEQ)
